results.title: Proteomic Analysis Reveals That Metformin Suppresses PSMD2, STIP1, and CAP1 for Preventing Gastric Cancer AGS Cell Proliferation and Migration
results.text_hl: Proteomic Analysis Reveals That @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Suppresses @GENE_PSMD2 @GENE_5708 @@@PSMD2@@@, STIP1, and @GENE_CAP1 @GENE_10487 @@@CAP1@@@ for Preventing @DISEASE_Stomach_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013274 @@@Gastric Cancer@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Aicardi_Goutieres_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535607 @@@AGS@@@ Cell Proliferation and Migration

results.title: Metformin Reduces Oxidative Damage in RNASEH2-Mutant Aicardi-Goutieres Cells.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: In conclusion, even if these pilot results need to be confirmed on a larger cohort, we shed light on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment as a valid approach to ameliorate oxidative stress-related @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Aicardi_Goutieres_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535607 @@@AGS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Dragoni F, Garau J, Rizzo B, Orcesi S, Varesio C, Di Gerlando R, Bordoni M, Scarian E, Cereda C, Pansarasa O, Gagliardi S. Metformin Reduces Oxidative Damage in RNASEH2-Mutant Aicardi-Goutieres Cells. Genes (Basel). 2025 Jul 30;16(8):. PMID: 40869969
